thread.title: robert burke
thread.title_full: Wilson Amplifiers reviewed by robert burke

author: robert burke
title: robert burke
text: I purchased a mobile cell boost system and it arrived fast. The item wasn't strong enough for my remote location and they excepted the return quickly. There customer service worked with me to determine the system that would work best. Would recommend doing business with I will in the future.
